thread.title: Lynne Parkhill

author: Lynne Parkhill
title: Lynne Parkhill
text:
Found this site and read all the reviews, so I decided to go for it.
Within 24 hours, I signed up, created a profile, posted dates needed, and filled my dates needed with an EXCELLENT housesitter within an hour's drive from me that even had Top Secret/FBI clearance! Was able to meet with her before the scheduled dates, and, later, our experience was A+.
Our pets didn't even miss us -- in fact, I think they were sad to see their housesitter leave them! We have a stress free vacation, knowing our home/pets were in good hands --and our housesitter had a wonderful 'staycation' at our beach condo. So glad I found this service -- will definitely use for future needs!
